channel.title: CVE Feed for Contest Gallery -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Contest Gallery -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-28784|2024-08-02T14:48:16.813Z -- contest%20gallery -- contest%20gallery
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Contest Gallery plugin <= 21.1.2 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-39631|2024-08-02T14:44:24.823Z -- contest%20gallery -- contest%20gallery
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Contest Gallery allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Contest Gallery: from n/a through 23.1.2.

item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Contest Gallery.This issue affects Contest Gallery: from n/a through 21.3.4.
